definition: decorated knob protruding from seal, allowing it to be strung on a cord
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image

sentences.english: Tortoise is an auspicious animal that the magnifico used it for chop in ancient time.
sentences.chinese: 龜，是祥瑞之物，在古代，有大官的印紐爲龜。
